items.title: CCI clears Rs 13,630-crore Mankind Pharma-Bharat Serums Vaccines deal
items.description: In July this year, Mankind Pharma announced that it will fully acquire Bharat Serums and Vaccines from private equity firm Advent International for around Rs 13,630 crore.
